condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Country programme is effectively planned, monitored and evaluated

description.narrative: The office improved annual planning and monitoring systems for the implementation of 2019-2023 CPD with greater attention to multisectoral programming. New tools to monitor humanitarian results were successfully implemented. Partnership documents, planning processes and donor reporting received effective quality assurance for greater focus on results including stronger focus on vulnerabilities and gender. Risk and resource management improved thanks to the provision of training on HACT and budget monitoring. Results-based work plans were developed and knowledge was generated as a result of strengthened capacity of Government and staff on RBM, planning, monitoring and data quality management. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/12/2019

title.narrative: % of donor reports submitted on time
% of HACT Plan implemented on a yearly basis
